messages.title: Why I am backing Chris Jones
messages.content: We need people like Chris in Parliament - people who’ve worked in the real world and know the issues. Chris has a real passion for mental health and a commitment to our public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End creeping privatisation of our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris Jones plans to prevent private companies from profiting off our NHS by stopping the outsourcing of services and returning to the NHS's foundational values.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Education for all not favouritism for a few
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris Jones emphasis on providing quality education for all, not just the select few, by opposing selective education and supporting local headteachers.
Chris Jones wants to hire more Police Officers, invest in youth services, and promote a restorative justice system to address the increase in crime rates and police budget cuts.

issues.education: Chris Jones opposes favouritism in education and supports funding for all schools.
issues.health: Focusing on mental health and social care is a priority for Chris Jones, as mentioned in his 15 years of working in the local health service.
issues.socialWelfare: Promising to protect the pension triple lock is one of Chris Jones's commitments.

housing.content: Protecting our homes and communities involves hiring more Police Officers and investing in youth services.

leaflet.personalStatement: For over 30 years I’ve been an NHS doctor. Now I’m standing for election to continue the commitment to helping the most vulnerable in our community.

contactInformation.address: St Mark's Church Hall, Hall Road, Norwich, NR1 3HL

endorsements.endorsement: Chris has a real passion for mental health and a commitment to our public services.

images.caption: Dr. Chris Jones in front of Norfolk's mental health services at Hellesdon Hospital in Norwich North.
